“ We don't serve you 'ho-hum', every day prices ”

LIPS search engine provides the best advertised liquor prices anywhere in New Zealand.

LIPS database is compiled by recording advertised liquor prices from newspapers, circulars, mailers and email offers from leading retailers nationwide.
